title: 'Variations'
order: 3
category: 'components'
subCategory: 'actions'
customPath: '/components/actions/button'
---

<Types>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <ButtonPrimary>Primary</ButtonPrimary>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Primary button</span>
      <p class="if">
        The primary button is used for primary action. The button is used to dictate what the primary action of a view
        is. Never use more than one primary button for one view. <strong class="if">Use sparingly</strong>.
      </p>
      <p class="if">
        The primary button is a filled button. The fill color used is{' '}
        <span class="if color-badge">
          <span class="if color-drop accentBlue"></span>BL 1, BLUE
        </span>
        . The text color is{' '}
        <span class="if color-badge">
          <span class="if color-drop backgroundLightestBeige"></span>BE 5, LIGHTEST BEIGE
        </span>
        .{' '}
      </p>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <ButtonSecondary>Secondary</ButtonSecondary>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Secondary button</span>
      <p class="if">The secondary button is the default button. It is used for non-primary actions.</p>
      <p class="if">
        The secondary button is an outlined button. The outline and text color is{' '}
        <span class="if color-badge">
          <span class="if color-drop accentBlue"></span>BL 1, BLUE
        </span>
        .
      </p>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <ButtonText>Text</ButtonText>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Text button</span>
      <p class="if">The text button is a button used for miniscule actions, or when a solid button is not wanted.</p>
      <p class="if">
        The text color is{' '}
        <span class="if color-badge">
          <span class="if color-drop accentBlue"></span>BL 1, BLUE
        </span>
        .
      </p>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <ButtonInfo>Info</ButtonInfo>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Info button</span>
      <p class="if">
        The info button is used for the rare occasion when you want a button that stands out, when the primary button is
        not natural to use. <strong class="if">Use sparingly</strong>.
      </p>
      <p class="if">
        The info button is a filled button. The fill color used is{' '}
        <span class="if color-badge">
          <span class="if color-drop backgroundDarkBrown"></span>BR 1, BROWN
        </span>
        . The text color is{' '}
        <span class="if color-badge">
          <span class="if color-drop backgroundLightestBeige"></span>BE 5, LIGHTEST BEIGE
        </span>
        .{' '}
      </p>
    </Description>
  </Type>
</Types>

## Modes

### Inverse

<TextLayoutLeft>

The Secondary, Text and Info button can be in inverse mode.

</TextLayoutLeft>


<Types>
<Type>
<Example mode="inverse">
  <div class="if" style="display:flex;">
    <button type="button" class="if button secondary inverse" style="margin-bottom: 0;">
     Inverse
    </button>
    <button type="button" class="if button secondary inverse">
    <svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
      <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
        <line x1="3" y1="31" x2="29" y2="31" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <line x1="19" y1="6" x2="24" y2="11" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <polygon points="11 24 4 26 6 19 23 2 28 7 11 24" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
      </g>
    </svg>
    Inverse
    </button>
  </div>
</Example>
</Type>
